participant_1.background:
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
I like to sit on my porch and watch the clouds go by.

participant_2.background:
My most valued possession is my sports jersey
I was a park ranger for many years before I started my current job.
i like eating healthy foods.
I like to visit music websites to keep up with new releases and find new artists to listen to.
i was a swimmer in college.

content.text: Not much, just enjoying the weather. How about you?
Same, it's so nice outside today. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and swimming, and I recently started volunteering at a local park. What do you like to do?
I'm an actor, so I spend a lot of time rehearsing and performing. I also like to cook and garden.
That's cool, I've always wanted to try acting. What's your favorite thing about cooking?
I love creating new dishes and sharing them with my family and friends. What's your favorite thing about swimming?
I love the feeling of being in the water and the exercise. I also love swimming with my friends and family.
That's great. I'm glad you have so many hobbies that you enjoy.
Thanks, me too. It keeps me busy and I always have something to look forward to.
That's a good way to live. I think I'm going to go make dinner now. What are you up to for the rest of the day?
I'm going to go for a swim and then relax on my porch. I hope you have a good day!
